target.name: help
target.echo:
Welcome to the Drecomm build system! --------------------------------- This build system is designed to be run from the Build/Phing folder of your project.
You may use the following command format to perform a task: phing -f Master.xml <task>
Flags and properties can be given to Phing like this phing -f Master.xml -Dsomeflag phing -f Master.xml -Dname=value
The available tasks can be listed with phing -f Build/Phing/Master.xml -l
